entity.name: Andrew Cuomo
entity.description: Governor of New York, Andrew Cuomo

text: @NYGovCuomo And the only way you feed vulnerable nursing home residents to the coronavirus is by mandating that COVID+ patients be admitted to nursing homes under penalty of law. And you did just that. What a disgrace you are governor! You have the blood of thousands on your hands.
